quests.description: Engage in a nonproductive creative hobby for an evening
Engage in a social hobby such as sports, dancing or a class teaching something
Try preparing a meal from a recipe you have not tried before
Go for a walk, leave the phone at home and just be there with your thoughts
One day this week, focus on how tired you feel and when, try take short breaks and be gentler with your body on that day.
Spend one day this week with the phone turned off.
Spend some time in nature this week, see if there's any place new you can go to
Schedule some social time this week, be it with friends, family or loved ones
Focus on the quality of sleep this week, try to make it as restful as you can
